TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LegendCellColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 表示圖例中的資料格資料行，用來擴充預設圖例的功能。

span.span: Represents a cell column in a legend, which is used to extend the functionality of the default legend.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以放置任意數目的資料格資料行，以任何順序，可讓您彈性地擴充預設圖例項目的能力。Any number of cell columns can be placed in any order, which gives you the flexibility to extend the abilities of the default legend entries. 圖例資料格資料行，才適用於從數列或資料點會自動產生的項目。The legend cell columns are only applicable to items that are automatically generated from series or data points.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格資料行型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the legend cell column type.

value.span: 列舉值，表示圖例資料格資料行類型。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the legend cell column type.

value.span: 這個值表示此型別將用來定義圖例資料格資料行內容。

span.span: This value represents the type that will be used to define the legend cell column contents.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定將會顯示在每個個別的圖例資料格資料行的內容類型。This property determines the type of content that will be displayed in each individual legend cell column. 有兩個可能值：There are two possible values: - 文字： 根據預設，#LEGENDTEXT 關鍵字用於放置中每個資料格資料行的值。Text: By default, the #LEGENDTEXT keyword is used to place the value in each cell column. 不過，您可以使用屬性來設定對應數列的值會取代任何關鍵字。However, you can use the property to set any keyword(s) that will be replaced by a value of the corresponding series. - Seriessymbol 5d;: 圖例資料格會包含一系列的符號，例如矩形、 線條、 標記或標記，其對應數列的填滿色彩相同的行。SeriesSymbol: The legend cell will contain a series symbol, such as a rectangle, line, line with marker, or marker, of the same fill color as its corresponding series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性時，才適用設，和`string`值定義為屬性。This property is only applicable when the is set to , and a `string` value is defined for the property. 您可以使用屬性來設定圖例資料格資料行的字型屬性。You can use the property to set font properties of the legend cell column. 如果您嘗試變更這個屬性物件在執行階段，會發生編譯錯誤。If you attempt to change the properties of this object at run time, a compilation error will occur. 若要在執行階段設定字型屬性，您必須建立新物件。To set font properties at run time, you must create a new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 圖例資料格的名稱必須是唯一的。否則會擲回例外狀況。The name of the legend cell must be unique; otherwise an exception will be thrown. 屬性可用來當做索引子時擷取物件從。The property can be used as the indexer when retrieving a object from the . 如果您將這個屬性設為零長度字串，就會擲回例外狀況。If you set this property to a zero-length string, an exception will be thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 數列符號大小是以圖例字型大小的百分比測量。The size of the series symbol is measured as a percentage of the legend font size. 這個屬性才適用如果屬性設定為。This property is only applicable if the property is set to .

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.KeywordsStringEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格資料行的工具提示文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip text for the legend cell column.

value.span: 值，表示圖例資料格資料行的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip for the legend cell column.

value.span: 預設值為零長度字串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ToolTip`屬性設定圖例項目和圖例資料格，圖例資料格屬性的優先順序。If the `ToolTip` property is set for both a legend item and a legend cell, the legend cell property has precedence. 這個屬性可讓您設定要顯示不同類型的圖表相關資料的特殊關鍵字。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data.
